exceptions.exn: In environment m, n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m The term "p" has type "pos m" while it is expected to have type "pos (S ?n)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
m: nat
r: pos_map m n
p: pos m

Goal:
pm_lift r (pos_nxt p) = pos_nxt (r p)

Premises:
pos_map = fun m n : nat => pos m -> pos n : nat -> nat -> Set Arguments pos_map (_ _)%nat_scope
Notation pos_nxt := @Fin.FS
pm_lift : forall m n : nat, pos_map m n -> pos_map (S m) (S n)
Notation pos := Fin.t
pm_lift_fst : forall (m n : nat) (r : pos_map m n), pm_lift r pos0 = pos0
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat] ?n : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.caseS' : forall (p0 : pos (S ?n)) (P : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P pos0 -> (forall p1 : pos ?n, P (pos_nxt p1)) -> P p0 where ?n : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type] ?n : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.depair_sanity : forall (o : pos ?m) (p0 : pos ?n), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.depair o p0)) = ?n * proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat o) + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat] ?n : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (w : VectorDef.t ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type] ?B : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type] ?C : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type]
pos_nxt_inj : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), pos_nxt p = pos_nxt q -> p = q
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p0 : pos ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p0)) = p0 where ?m : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> VectorDef.t ?C n0 where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type] ?B : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type] ?C : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type] ?B : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p0 q : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p0 = q where ?n : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.weak : forall p0 : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p0 + ?m) -> pos (p0 + ?n) where ?m : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat] ?n : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type] ?B : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type]
Fin.L_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p0 : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.L n0 p0)) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.R_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p0 : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.R n0 p0)) = n0 + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.L : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (?m + n0) where ?m : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- nat]
pos_both_lr : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos n + pos m), pos_both n m (pos_lr p) = p
pos_both_left : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos n), pos_both n m (pos_left m p) = inl p
VectorDef.const : ?A -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r : pos_map m n p : pos m |- Type]

```coq
destruct (pos_S_inv p) as [H | [q H]].
- rewrite H. simpl. reflexivity.
- rewrite H. simpl. apply pm_lift_fst.
Qed.
```

original: destruct (pos_S_inv p) as [H | [q H]]. - rewrite H. simpl. reflexivity. - rewrite H. simpl. apply pm_lift_fst.
